faq1_q: How much does a NAATI translation cost? What is the turnaround time?
faq1_p1: The quote and turnaround time depend on the number of pages, the document format and the complexity of the content.
faq1_p2: In general, one-page documents are delivered within 24 hours after payment confirmation. Longer documents are usually delivered within 2 to 4 business days.
faq1_p3: A 15% surcharge applies for urgent documents.
faq2_p1: Jobs are confirmed with 100% payment. We’ll share bank details or alternatives if you don’t have an Australian account.
faq3_p1: Translations are delivered by email with a digital stamp, unless a printed version is requested.
faq3_p2: Digital NAATI translations are just as valid as ink-stamped translations.
faq4_p1: NAATI is the national standards and certification authority for translators and interpreters in Australia. Translations do not expire. AUSIT stands for “Australian Institute of Interpreters and Translators” and represents language professionals nationally in Australia to ensure quality and ethical standards.
faq5_p1: The Australian Institute of Interpreters and Translators (AUSIT) is the national association for the translating and interpreting profession. Our members adhere to a strict Code of Ethics and follow continuous professional development

feat1_p: You'll speak with a professional who will adapt to your needs, answer your questions, and help you achieve your goals, because we understand that behind every translation, there is a person seeking to fulfill a migration, employment, or educational dream.
feat2_p: When working with important documents, accuracy is essential. That's why our translations are handled by specialized professionals who use the appropriate terminology and adhere to industry standards, ensuring that the translations are accepted by the relevant authorities.
feat3_p: We know that time is valuable. That's why we ensure you receive convenient and clear delivery times, so you can plan your strategy without delays. We guarantee the confidentiality of your documents and adhere to the NAATI and AUSIT codes of ethics.
srv1_p: We work with diverse industries, helping businesses expand, gain more customers, and meet the quality standards and cultural expectations of each country. We create translation memories to maintain consistency and terminology databases to ensure accuracy for every client.
srv2_p1: We provide NAATI-stamped translations for migration, study or work purposes in Australia. We work with legal translation experts to ensure accurate documents accepted by Australian authorities. Translations can be delivered digitally or with a physical stamp, depending on requirements. We want to help you achieve your goals!

srv2_p2: We translate all kinds of documents. Feel free to contact us if your document isn’t on the list.
srv3_p: We provide a human review of texts produced using translation memories or machine translation tools. Does your brand image, the communication of important information or your visa application depend on a translation? Then it’s essential to ensure it has been reviewed by trained professionals. We’re here to help.
srv4_p: Coming soon: NAATI-certified interpreting services for meetings, conferences and events in Australia. Stay tuned for updates!
about_lead: I am Lucia Giulietti, a technical-scientific translator in English, a graduate of the IES en Lenguas Vivas “Juan Ramón Fernández”, one of the most prestigious language institutions in Argentina.
about_p1: Since 2021, I have helped clients worldwide achieve their goals: publishing scientific articles, translating health courses, expanding into international markets, promoting climate action, and more. Having worked with global organizations and as a member of the International Federation of Translators' team of translators, I meet the highest industry standards.
about_p2: In 2023, I moved to Australia, where I traveled extensively and immersed myself in the local culture. Then, with the goal of supporting people in their migration journeys, I obtained my NAATI English <> Spanish certification and became a trusted partner for my clients. I adhere to the NAATI and AUSIT codes of ethics to ensure the highest standards of quality, confidentiality, and professionalism in every project.
about_highlight_title: What I enjoy most about translation
about_highlight_text: To make a positive impact, because behind every translation there is a person with a goal: to access healthcare or other public services, to emigrate to another country, to expand their business into the international market, to publish a new scientific discovery, etc. I work with passion, commitment, and professionalism on every project.
